attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage admits there WON'T be extra £350m for NHS - within HOUR of Brexit result
This is in all newspaper and bbc
attributes.background:
EU referendum results are not good for uk.
Most of the voters who voted to leave are now in regret and feel like to revote or reverse the outcome .Most didn't know the real fact and consequence of Britexit.Most of them are miss leaded like nhs promise by nigel which he accept was mistake.
